description: 3 vols. containing bāb 1-71. ff. 112, 101, 107. 345 x 250; 238 x 162 mm. 35 lin. 17th cen. According to notes at end of each volume, the ms. has been collated with the autograph in Konya, 1276 H. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 572 (no. 10); S I, 792 (no. 11); Yaḥyá, Histoire, no. 135. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى اوجد الاشىاء
author: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
title: al-Futūḥāt al-Makkīyah
creator: Ibn al-ʻArabī, 1165-1240
subject: Sufism—Doctrines—Early works to 1800
